text: Upfield Holdings B.V. is a Dutch food company. It owns multiple brands of margarine, food spreads, and plant-based foods. It is the largest plant-based consumer packaged goods company in the world, operating in 95 countries. It was spun off from Unilever and purchased by investment firm Kohlberg Kravis Roberts (KKR) in 2018 for US$8.04 billion. Category:2018 establishments in Europe Category:Food companies
title: Upfield (company)
